events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I need to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and I would like to return it.
The case has been reviewed and categorized as a refund request due to customer dissatisfaction with the product fit.
Your refund request has been assigned to one of our customer service agents who will assist you further.
Hello! Thank you for contacting our support team. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket order. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and whether the jacket has been worn or damaged so we can process your refund quickly?
Thank you for responding. My order number is 123456789, and the jacket is in perfect condition. I just need to return it because the size is too small.
We’ve initiated your refund request. Please send the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will email to you shortly.
Thanks for sending the return label. I appreciate your quick help with this refund process.
We have received the returned jacket in good condition and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since your refund was completed successfully and you have no further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us.
We’ve sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund service. Your feedback is valuable to us.
I completed your survey and was very satisfied with how quickly and kindly my refund request was handled. Thanks again!
The refund request case has been archived following closure and survey completion to maintain accurate records.
